name: Cyberduk
description:
Platformer with physics!

You're playing as Cyberduk - an unstoppable mesh of blood and steel on a monowheel chair. You're driven by the mad idea of collecting all of the Red Crystals before anyone else gets to them. Of course, it couldn't be so easy, because all of the crystals are scattered between shaky platforms hanging in the middle of the sky.

Run, jump, tame these physics, and get all these crystals!

Controls:

1. A/D - Move Left/Right

2. W/Space - Jump

3. R - Reload Level

Credits:

Music is by Anonymous420, in public domain.
